HIVE-24342: isPathEncrypted should make sure resolved path also from HDFS.

timeline.bodyText: Is there a case that HDFS file system can be mounted as other file systems?
timeline.author: yongzhi

replies.bodyText: @yongzhi Thanks for taking a look. yes, we have implemented ViewDistributedFileSystem and ViewFsOverloadScheme in hadoop. They both supports hdfs paths can be mounted with other fs. You can see in the description and traces that hdfs paths pointing to o3fs paths.
replies.author: umamaheswararao

replies.bodyText: Thanks for offline discussion @yongzhi. I have updated comments for better clarity as you suggested!!
